sys_script_include.name: CheckDate

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_adeccc4c07b521102016f9fc7c1ed02f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_976190_library.CheckDate</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>CheckDate</name><script><![CDATA[var CheckDate = Class.create();
CheckDate.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    isPastDate: function() {
        var rightnow = new GlideDateTime().getLocalDate();
        var testdate = new GlideDateTime(this.getParameter('sysparm_startDate')).getLocalDate();
        return testdate.compareTo(rightnow);

    },
    isSameDay: function() {
        var to = new GlideDateTime(this.getParameter('sysparm_to')).getLocalDate();
        var from = new GlideDateTime(this.getParameter('sysparm_from')).getLocalDate();
        return to.compareTo(from);
		
    },
    type: 'CheckDate'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-20 12:51:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>adeccc4c07b521102016f9fc7c1ed02f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CheckDate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Library" source="x_976190_library">5812a33f0701e1102016f9fc7c1ed031</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Library">5812a33f0701e1102016f9fc7c1ed031</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_adeccc4c07b521102016f9fc7c1ed02f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-20 12:51:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
